summary: Elizabeth Cole  is an American stage, television series and movie actress.
full_text: Elizabeth Ashley  is an American actress of theatre, film, and television. She has been nominated for three Tony Awards, winning once in 1962 for Take Her, She's Mine. Ashley was also nominated for the BAFTA and Golden Globe awards for her performance in The Carpetbaggers , and was nominated for an Emmy Award in 1991 for Evening Shade.
title: Elizabeth Ashley
